title: [Storj DCS] uplink: upload done: already committed and "too many open files"
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Errors while synching to Storj DCS

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
rclone v1.55.1
- os/type: linux
- os/arch: amd64
- go/version: go1.16.3
- go/linking: static
- go/tags: none
```

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

Ubuntu 20.04

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

Storj DCS (ex-Tardigrade, maybe also rename it...)

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone sync /ofs/users/user storj:user -P`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

Lots of 

`ERROR : FS sj://user: cp input ./1/Archives/Vid√©o "1 jour 1 projet"/Lucie.mp4 [HashesOption([])]: stream error: open /tmp/tee094727115: too many open files`

and many

```
ERROR : FS sj://user: cp input ./preview/6/1/7/6/b/2/d/153965/1024-1024-crop.png [HashesOption([])]: uplink: upload done: already committed
        storj.io/uplink.errwrapf:74
        storj.io/uplink.(*Upload).Abort:160
        github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/tardigrade.(*Fs).Put.func1:548
        github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/tardigrade.(*Fs).Put:581
        github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.Copy:472
        github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync.(*syncCopyMove).pairCopyOrMove:398
Failed to copy: uplink: stream error: ecclient error: successful puts (65) less than success threshold (80)
```
and on the `syslog`

`request_module: kmod_concurrent_max (0) close to 0 (max_modprobes: 50), for module tcp_ledbat, throttling...`

I can't reproduce this last syslog line while synching not to Storj DCS, but to an SFTP.

<!--- Please keep the note below for others who read your bug report. -->

* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
